comment.author: 39839593@N00
comment._content: This is probably Gustav Krupp von Bohlen und Halbach: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Gustav_Krupp_von_Bohlen_und_Halbach CEO of the Krupp Iron Works company.

comment.author: 32693117@N08
comment._content: Yes, that's a misspelling. It should also be "Herr" Krupp, and "von" Bohlen.

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: Michiel2005:  It does seem likely it's the same person; episodesandaccidents:  Thanks for the corrected spelling.  We'll include these fixes to the description next time we update.
